scripts.init: test -f examples/examples.json && echo 'Already initialized, skipping' || (rm -rf .git && rm -rf objectiveai && git init && git submodule add https://github.com/ObjectiveAI/objectiveai objectiveai && git submodule update --init --recursive && npm install && git add . && git commit -m "Initial commit" && ts-node readonly/init.ts)
